LightningComponentBundle.description: Component to display list of records

property.name: iconName
property.label: Icon name
property.description: On the format category:iconName. See available icons: https://lightningdesignsystem.com/icons/

property.name: content
property.label: Content
property.description: API name of content field. If empty, only title will appear

property.name: objectName
property.label: Object Name
property.description: API Name of Object to get data from

property.name: orderby
property.label: Order list by
property.description: SOQL Order by. For example 'LastModifiedDate DESC' to see the last edited first

property.name: limit
property.label: Limit
property.description: SOQL number of records. For example '3'

property.name: listviewname
property.label: List view
property.description: API Name of list view to redirect to

property.name: linklabel
property.label: Link Label
property.description: Label of link to redirect to list view

property.name: datefield
property.label: Date field
property.description: API Name of date field. Supported: LastModifiedDate, CreatedDate

property.name: showimage
property.label: Show image?
property.description: Show the latest related image of the record
